metadata.name: HackTool - CobaltStrike Malleable Profile Patterns - Proxy
metadata.comment: Detects cobalt strike malleable profiles patterns (URI, User-Agents, Methods).

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/5.0 (windows nt 6.1; wow64; trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like gecko') AND lower(http_request.http_method) = lower('get') AND lower(http_request.url) = lower('/s/ref=nb_sb_noss_1/167-3294888-0262949/field-keywords=books') AND lower(dst_endpoint.hostname) = lower('www.amazon.com') AND exists(http_cookies, x -> endswith(lower(x.value), lower('=csm-hit=s-24ku11bb82rzsygj3bdk|1419899012996'))) OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/5.0 (windows nt 6.1; wow64; trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like gecko') AND lower(http_request.http_method) = lower('post') AND lower(http_request.url) = lower('/n4215/adj/amzn.us.sr.aps') AND lower(dst_endpoint.hostname) = lower('www.amazon.com') OR lower(LOWER(http_request.user_agent)) in ('mozilla/4\\.0 (compatible; msie 6\\.0;windows nt 5\\.1)', 'mozilla/4\\.0 (compatible; msie 7\\.0; windows nt 6\\.1; wow64; trident/4\\.0; slcc2; \\.net clr 3\\.0\\.30729; \\.net4\\.0c; \\.net4\\.0e )', 'mozilla/5\\.0 (windows; u; msie 7\\.0; windows nt 5\\.2) java/1\\.5\\.0_08') OR endswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('; manm; manm)')) OR contains(lower(http_request.url), lower('/oscp/')) AND lower(dst_endpoint.hostname) = lower('ocsp.verisign.com') OR lower(http_request.http_method) = lower('get') AND endswith(lower(http_request.url), lower('?manifest=wac')) AND lower(dst_endpoint.hostname) = lower('onedrive.live.com')) AND NOT (startswith(lower(http_request.url), lower('http')) AND contains(lower(http_request.url), lower('://onedrive.live.com/'))))

output.summary: Detects cobalt strike malleable profiles patterns (URI, User-Agents, Methods).
